short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the precise latitude and longitude of any point on Google Maps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension adds a red dot at the center of Google Maps maps. Clicking the dot reveals the center's coordinates â€” as an alert box (Mac/Linux only), and in Chrome's developer console (Mac/Linux/Windows).

Glat/Glong works on both the new ("preview") and old versions Google Maps.

--- 

# Privacy

Glat/Glong does not collect any data, or share your data or actions with anybody.

Glat/Glong does not load any "external" resources, such as analytics scripts, Facebook widgets, et cetera.
